remarks: Change bound variable.  This is to ~ cbvexvw what ~ cbvaliw is to ~ cbvalvw .  [TODO: move after ~ cbvalivw ].  (Contributed by BJ, 17-Mar-2020.)
statement:
bj-cbvexiw.1 $e |- ( E. x E. y ps -> E. y ps ) $.
bj-cbvexiw.2 $e |- ( ph -> A. y ph ) $.
bj-cbvexiw.3 $e |- ( y = x -> ( ph -> ps ) ) $.
